meanings.definition: Cited as an example or illustration.
meanings.sent1: The instanced photo helped the students understand the concept better.
meanings.sent2: The instanced evidence supported the scientist's theory.
meanings.sent3: The instanced drawing of a cat made everyone laugh in class.
meanings.sent4: Her instanced explanation was as clear as a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The instanced diagram made the complex idea easy to grasp.

meanings.definition: An occurrence or example of something.
meanings.sent1: The instanced of kindness she showed was heartwarming.
meanings.sent2: Each instanced of rain brought relief to the dry land.
meanings.sent3: The instanced of a dog riding a skateboard was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: His success was an instanced of hard work paying off.
meanings.sent5: The instanced of teamwork they displayed was truly inspiring.
